name: certificate-verification-root
description: Root script to run full stack certificate verification app

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../smart_contracts && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n "CHAIN,SERVER,CLIENT" -c "gray,blue,green" "cd smart_contracts && npx hardhat node" "npx wait-on tcp:8545 && cd smart_contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost && cd ../server && node index.js" "npx wait-on tcp:8545 && cd client && npm run dev"
